data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: When you connect (which may take a while longer than normal directories on your computer for network speed reasons), you can use it like any other directory as if it is on your computer. Of ____, ____ there ____ some ____ of ____ issue ( such ____ a ____ router ____ a ____ internet ____ ), these ____ may ____ restricted ____ unavailable. However, if there is a case that your computer is downed (such as a hard drive disk malfunction), if there are any files you stored on through a network drive, they will still persist by the sheer fact that the file is physically stored elsewhere.
data.partBlankContent: When you connect (which may take a while longer than normal directories on your computer for network speed reasons), you can use it like any other directory as if it is on your computer. Of cou___, i_ there i_ some ki__ of net____ issue ( such a_ a dow___ router o_ a probl______ internet conne_____ ), these serv____ may b_ restricted o_ unavailable. However, if there is a case that your computer is downed (such as a hard drive disk malfunction), if there are any files you stored on through a network drive, they will still persist by the sheer fact that the file is physically stored elsewhere.
data.fullContent: When you connect (which may take a while longer than normal directories on your computer for network speed reasons), you can use it like any other directory as if it is on your computer. Of course, if there is some kind of network issue ( such as a downed router or a problematic internet connection ), these services may be restricted or unavailable. However, if there is a case that your computer is downed (such as a hard drive disk malfunction), if there are any files you stored on through a network drive, they will still persist by the sheer fact that the file is physically stored elsewhere.
data.answer: 当您连接时(由于网络速度的原因，这可能会比您计算机上的普通目录花费更长的时间)，您可以像使用计算机上的任何其他目录一样使用它。当然，如果存在某种网络问题(如路由器宕机或网络连接问题)，这些服务可能会受到限制或不可用。但是，如果您的计算机宕机(例如硬盘驱动器故障)，如果您通过网络驱动器存储了任何文件，则由于文件物理存储在其他地方，这些文件仍然会持续存在。
